The claim made by Sen: Lindsey Graham is that the USA Freedom Act will result in hundreds of phone company employees having access to phone records, as opposed to just a few government employees.
The expert: s verdict clarifies that the phone companies have always held this data, and the new law does not change that.
Prior to the Freedom Act: major cell phone providers would regularly hand over phone records to the NSA, which maintained a massive database. The access to this database was restricted to a limited number of government employees.
